div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2140 Cassibile, 15 km. SW of Syracuse, 1961 Burial: 350-300 B.C. (K); c. 325 (Currò) Contents: 7+ AE Syracuse (Zeus/horse [3]; Zeus/thunderbolt [4]) Part of a much larger hoard Disposition: Syracuse 7 Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, pp. 231, 237, 253-4
